name: remove-ms-bing-integration
title: Remove Microsoft Bing Integration
description: Removes Bing apps and disables Bing web search in Windows Search.
deepDescription: Removes all Microsoft Bing apps (News, Weather, Finance, etc.) and disables Bing web search results from appearing in Windows Search. This improves privacy and speeds up local searches.
modal:
This will remove all Bing apps (News, Weather, etc.) and disable Bing web search in Windows Search.

To restore, you can reinstall apps from the Microsoft Store.
